issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
With multiple threads accessing same {{Subject}}, it can cause {{ServiceTicket}} in use be by one thread be destroyed by another thread.

Running BasicDRPCTopology with high parallelism in secure cluster would reproduce the issue.

Here is sample log from such a scenarios:
{code}
2016-01-20 15:52:26.904 o.a.t.t.TSaslTransport [ERROR] SASL negotiation failure
javax.security.sasl.SaslException: GSS initiate failed
        at com.sun.security.sasl.gsskerb.GssKrb5Client.evaluateChallenge(GssKrb5Client.java:211) ~[?:1.8.0_40]
        at org.apache.thrift7.transport.TSaslClientTransport.handleSaslStartMessage(TSaslClientTransport.java:94) ~[storm-core-0.10.1.y.jar:0.10.1.y]

        at backtype.storm.drpc.DRPCInvocationsClient.reconnectClient(DRPCInvocationsClient.java:57) [storm-core-0.10.1.y.jar:0.10.1.y]
        at backtype.storm.drpc.ReturnResults.reconnectClient(ReturnResults.java:113) [storm-core-0.10.1.y.jar:0.10.1.y]

fields.summary: Multiple Subject sharing Kerberos TGT - causes services to fail

comments.body:
GitHub user kishorvpatil opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1177

    [STORM-1596] Do not single Kerberos TGT instance between multiple threads.

    This needs to be ported to 1.x-branch as well. 

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/kishorvpatil/incubator-storm storm1596

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1177.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #1177
    
----
commit 2ab6a84eb8715d2e6a4514bf079b8d893f6d15f7
Author: Kishor Patil <kpatil@yahoo-inc.com>
Date:   2016-02-12T22:39:57Z

    Fixing Kerberos TGT failure issues caused by  sharing single instance by multiple subjects
    
    Conflicts:
    	storm-core/src/jvm/backtype/storm/security/auth/AuthUtils.java
    	storm-core/src/jvm/backtype/storm/security/auth/kerberos/AutoTGT.java
    	storm-core/src/jvm/backtype/storm/security/auth/kerberos/AutoTGTKrb5LoginModule.java

commit e6e96a53e26f7a41f61bd13e2112fe0a7a1f1e7a
Author: Kishor Patil <kpatil@yahoo-inc.com>
Date:   2016-02-13T01:08:13Z

    Fixing auto login module tests
    
    Conflicts:
    	storm-core/test/clj/backtype/storm/security/auth/auto_login_module_test.clj

----

Github user kishorvpatil commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1177#issuecomment-191508435
  
    The Travis CI test failure seems unrelated to this issue.

Github user revans2 commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1177#issuecomment-191792836
  
    +1 we might want to look at porting this to 0.10.x also.

GitHub user kishorvpatil opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1180

    [STORM-1596] Do not use single Kerberos TGT instance between multiple threads 0.10x

    

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/kishorvpatil/incubator-storm storm1598-010x

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1180.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #1180
    
----
commit 6d610744873af3f5fc73317516550d07d825e78b
Author: Kishor Patil <kpatil@yahoo-inc.com>
Date:   2016-02-12T22:39:57Z

    Fixing Kerberos TGT failure issues caused by  sharing single instance by multiple subjects
    
    Conflicts:
    	storm-core/src/jvm/backtype/storm/security/auth/AuthUtils.java

commit b8a3af7a6f0964500942e0c5e4a3960b82ebd289
Author: Kishor Patil <kpatil@yahoo-inc.com>
Date:   2016-02-13T01:08:13Z

    Fixing auto login module tests

----

Github user kishorvpatil commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1177#issuecomment-191816371
  
    Here #1180  is pull request to port these changes to 0.10.x-branch

Github user revans2 commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1180#issuecomment-191929057
  
    +1

Github user revans2 commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1180#issuecomment-191929292
  
    The code looks more or less identical to #1177 except for the java package names so I think I can merge it in now.

Github user asfgit closed the pull request at:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1177

Github user asfgit closed the pull request at:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1180

Thanks [~kishorvpatil],

I merged this into master, 1.x and 0.10.x
